title: sdformat install not relocatable: sdf::findFile searches original install location

content.raw:
As reported here: https://github.com/osrf/homebrew-simulation/issues/479

The issue is that the install path searched by `sdf::findFile` is the install location at compile time:

* #!/osrf/sdformat/src/5eac19ab542539b1f0de63905d45a225e54651bc/src/SDF.cc#lines-90:103
* #!/osrf/sdformat/src/5eac19ab542539b1f0de63905d45a225e54651bc/cmake/sdf_config.h.in#lines-30:31

We would need to change the logic of `sdf::findFile` to make it fully relocatable.
